name: Buckler
desc: Not much more than the size of a large dish, but can make the difference between life and death.

name: Chainmail Armor
desc: Armor set made of chainmail

name: Frost Armor
desc: Made of enchanted permafrost ice - an armor for a true warrior of the north.

name: Leather Armor
desc: Armor set made of leather

name: Robes
desc: Armor set made of cloth

name: Silver Feathers
desc: An armor made of delicate silvery feathers.

name: Studded Leather Armor
desc: Armor set made of leather and small stud plates.

name: Tower Shield
desc: Mighty carriable wall of wood and steel.

name: Wyrm Plate
desc: Heavy armor made from the scales of some ancient beast.

name: Brawler Teeth
desc: A souvenir from those Sidhe and possesed villagers who are terrorizing Elja and Druda in the Firestew Inn. Who knows, perhaps somebody will reward you for helping the Firestew Inn?

name: Ring from the Lake
desc: This old ring allows the party members to hold their breath much longer.

name: Spider Eggs
desc: a collection of spider eggs.

name: Healing Potion
desc: heals the user of minor wounds (+8 HP)

name: Extra Healing Potion
desc: heals the user of moderate wounds (+16 hp)

name: Spell Points Potion
desc: user regains some spell points (+20 SP)

name: Rare Incense of Recovery
desc: Rests the whole party upon usage - restores all charcters to 100 Percent in HP and SP. Very rare and very mighty. Use this only when really needed.

name: Chalybdium Amulett
desc: An amulet crafted with details that make reality pale. You could swear you just heard it whisper something...

name: Ring of Expertise
desc: This ring grants expertise in combat, increasing AC by 1.

name: Ring of Strength
desc: This ring grants great strength, + 2 STR.

name: Ring of Protection
desc: A ring with a shimmer of magic. Increases AC by one point.

name: Ring of Fire Resistance
desc: Ring made of solid gold that grants a 30% resistance to fire.

name: Black Death
desc: A masterfully crafted, dark longbow that engulfs the target in deadly blue energy.

name: Blade of Autumn
desc: The most beautiful sword you ever laid your eyes upon. It somehow puts you into a serene mood everytime you draw it.

name: Dagger
desc: small blade

name: Glacier Crusher
desc: A heavy hammer of blue ice, which prepared many a victim for an icy grave already.

name: Long Bow
desc: long bow constructed of common materials

name: Long Sword
desc: Long blade of standard construction

name: Short Bow
desc: short bow made of common materials

name: Short Sword
desc: a short sword constructed of standard but sound materials

name: Sling
desc: small sling made of common materials

name: Wand of Omgon
desc: A magic wand that produces a low humming sound everytime it is drawn. It shoots fiery projectiles of immense power. Requries a mysterious ruby called Blood of Omgon as ammunition.

name: Sling of Fire
desc: small sling made of common materials that adds 1 point of fire damage.

name: Arrow
desc: Basic arrows of standard construction.

name: Stone
desc: Basic stone used by slings.

name: Stone of Fire
desc: Stone used by slings. These stones add fire damage.

name: Spear
desc: Spear of standard construction

name: Blood of Omgon
desc: A ruby containing a thick liquid in its core. It's glowing fainlty in the deepest red. It's required as ammunition when trying to use the Wand of Omgon.
